title: geth went out of nohup for no reason traceable
body:
command  - 
sudo nohup geth --http --http.addr "0.0.0.0" --http.corsdomain "*" --ws --ws.origins '*' --ws.addr "0.0.0.0"  --cache "8192" --txlookuplimit "0" --authrpc.jwtsecret "/home/ubuntu/prysm/jwt.hex" &



last logs -

 Unhandled trie error: missing trie node
ed=4.490388ms
INFO [12-24|17:26:37.431] Imported new potential chain segment     blocks=1   txs=237  mgas=21.076  elapsed=887.389ms    mgasps=23.751  number=16,256,079 hash=d9cd4c..c8a143 dirty=1.30GiB
